amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used by the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation to enforce section 4010(c) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 148 (Roll no. 429).
